summary: Crafting, smitthing, upgrading, dropping, selling baseball bat with and without nails and other custom weapons. Ex of custom weapons: Ebony Scimitar, Iron made dragonborn arrows, stone hammer/ reinforced stone hammer....
descriptionHtml:
Crafting, smitthing, upgrading, dropping, selling baseball bat with and without nails and other custom weapons


Also has sound and anims that goes with it (not custom but they totaly work)


Balanced so its not to much powerful

New Arrows: Iron Made Dragonborn\'s Arrow


(Tell me if the recipe needs to be more balanced)


Btw: Damage that you see are for my lvl (Im like 25 in 2h ,perks and all that stuff also influence on it)



------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


v1.0:
Added Crafting, smitthing, upgrading, dropping and vendor selling baseball bat with and without nails.



v1.1:
Just updated the mod author on th esp and stuff like that



v1.2:
Greyish Color for the wood ( As a request of James )



v1.2b:
Added New screenshots

  (Steam Workshop only)

v1.3:
Updated the baseball bat with nail to Nailed Bat ( Request of Armdude )



v1.4:
New Arrows: Iron Made Dragonborn\'s Arrow with recipe (requires ebony smitthing perk )

Recipe show in misc slot



v1.5:
Added Ebony Scimitar for crafting, buying , looting...
(Obviouly require ebony smitthing perk to craft, 
show in ebony category)



v.1.6:
Added Stone hammer and Reinforced Stone Hammer ,crafting,buying , looting...

(Show in misc section at forge)


Future Plans:


-Adding new weapons 
(I have a musket and flintlock pistol, but will probably wait still we figure out anims and will probably make a ranged weapon pack for it)


-Add custom blood effect
-Add bleeding effect for the baseball bat with nails



Currently working on:



-Iron Made Dragonborn\'s Arrow Quiver


-Custom script for a dynamic leveling up sword


Compatibility:

Just incase somebody wanted to know
Every mods execpt if it adds something to the warhammer/sword leveled List
author: Lord Scripts
